item.title: Object-Oriented PHP - An Easy Approach
item.description: For some PHP developers, the concept of object-orient programming, seems like a frightening concept. You might have browsed through repos on GitHub or read articles on how to implement a feature in a particular PHP project of yours, and the code is full of complicated syntax.
